record.id: field.name="doc.lowest.number" and file.name="idoladapter" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: doc.lowest.number
record.file.name: idoladapter

brief.brief: To further improve the accuracy, system can remove the less relevant training document with lower weight. The documents with lower weight than Threshold will not be used for training. However, this number indicate that how many training samples are required for each category. Which means at least each category will have this number of training samples, even the samples weight is less than threshold.
